repnme.cdata!: Indonesia - West Java Thermal Power Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed Project would comprise: (a)
            construction of the 200 MW Muara Karang thermal station; (b)
            the Java System Development Study; and (c) the Citarum
            Hydroelectric Feasibility Study.
